title: 15 Best Memorial Day Outdoor Furniture Sales to Peruse (2025)
description: Better late than never to start sizing up your patio arrangement
author: Nashia Baker, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Shop these Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales so those loungers will be right on time for the next BBQ.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.It may be sweater weather in the Northeast, but everywhere else, the long weekend is being welcomed with open arms and sunny skies. The best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales, accordingly, are just the kinds of events you need to welcome warmer days with gusto.It’s the first unofficial BBQ weekend of the year, after all, meaning the time to reevaluate your sad yardscape was [checks notes] seven days ago. If your current assortment of patio furniture isn’t really meeting the moment, you can score some steep deals on fire pits, dining sets, sofas, and beyond if you’re willing to crack open the laptop for a few moments.To maximize your precious relaxation time, we’ve highlighted discounts up to 70% off throughout the Memorial Day weekend from some of our favorite outdoor furniture stores. That means all the important stuff, along with some smaller accessories like weather-resistant furniture covers. Keep scrolling to find the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales, where you can get a head start on prepping your crabgrass den for its summer glow-up.Our Top Picks for the Best Deals on Outdoor Furniture This Weekend:Best Dining Table: Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table, $749 $449Best Sectional: Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa, $9,949 $7,957Best Coffee Table: Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table, $625 $1,250Best Dining Set: Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set, $3,089 $3,168Best Outdoor Pillow: Lovett Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel, $98 $78Crate & Barrel: Up to 70% OffAt Crate & Barrel’s long weekend sale, clearance outdoor furniture is up to 70% off (note that some are final sale), with regular-priced outdoor items up to 30% off. The nature-inspired outdoor teak sectionals are extra handsome here, though you can also find multi-tasking pieces like a kitchen island that moonlights as an outdoor bar.Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional SofaCrate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with CushionBurrow: 25% Off Sitewide Plus Free ShippingBurrow is the place for modular pieces that will fit in the trickiest of places—say, a rooftop patio above the sunroom. The midcentury style of the Dunes collection may be right up your alley if you don’t want something overly contemporary for your space. Made with FSC-certified teak that has a dense structure and higher concentration of oils, the set is bound to last for years with proper care. (Cue the teak cleaner kit to keep it turning from golden into silvery gray.) The upholstery is also quick-drying and won’t absorb dirt and accidental spills. To sweeten the deal, Burrow is even throwing in free shipping on orders over $2,000.Burrow Dunes Teak Dining SetBurrow Dunes Teak 6-Piece SectionalOuter: 20% Sitewide, Up To 50% on Discontinued ItemsThanks to their sustainably made furniture and ease of delivery and assembly, Outer has long been a shopper-beloved outdoor furniture brand. From dining sets that can seat up to eight to their new Adirondack and matching ottoman and furniture covers, you can nab everything you need to kick off the outdoor living season. Outer even includes the bug-repellent throws in their spring sale for when the mosquitoes make their debut. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering a rare 20% off everything—making it an excellent time to invest in a outdoor sofa or splurge on a full seating system. Deal hunters can also save up to 50% on discontinued items when you shop before June 2, like the brand’s teak outdoor coffee table.Outer Teak Outdoor Sofa & ArmchairsOuter Teak Outdoor Coffee TableAmazon: Up to 60% OffAmazon’s outdoor collection offers everything from budget-friendly Adirondack chairs, outdoor dining sets, and coastal love seats, along with heaters and fire pits to keep you cozy during chillier months. When it comes to the latter, this streamlined fire pit (already affordable and even more so on sale) offers a smokeless design and a durable metal frame.OutVue Wood Burning Fire Pits with Grill & LidPamapic 5-Piece Patio Dining SetSerena & Lily: Up to 70% Off Plus Free Shipping on ClearanceSerena & Lily’s beachy wares make it easy to incorporate coastal design into even the most aggressively suburban homes, and if you’re browsing their summer sale (ending May 28), we’d steer you in the direction of their Pacifica sofa that our reviewer Blake Bakkila says is still thriving after three years out back.Serena & Lily Pacifica SofaSerena & Lily Del Mar Coffee TableArticle: Up to 40% OffHundreds of items are on sale at Article, one of our favorite purveyors of outdoor furniture, as we speak—like this fashionable outdoor sectional with netted armrests and a simple, but still stylish dining table.Article Latta Outdoor Dining TableArticle Callais Outdoor SectionalNeighbor: 15% Off OrdersAD100 designer Mandy Cheng told us “Neighbor’s roundabout sectional is one of [her] favorites when clients want a non-white sofa (which is everyone).” For Memorial Day you can snag 15% off Cheng's pick as well as everything else from the brand using code MD2025. If your outdoor space isn’t sectional-friendly, we recommend checking out the Haven sofa for a similar look. Add a couple of brand’s Low chairs to create a full conversation set.Neighbor Haven SofaNeighbor Low ChairLulu and Georgia: Up to 50% Off SitewideThe hotspot for designer collaborations and curated collections announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. Peruse the outdoor categories for delicious deals on outdoor furniture and decor, like the Lovett pillow that’s a must to spruce up conversation sets, and a modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed coffee table that can also be an indoor piece. Indoor/outdoor rugs are also includes in the sale—and just picture how great the a coordinating Lovett rug will look beneath a dining table. Sale ends May 27.Scalloped Indoor / Outdoor Coffee Table by Sarah Sherman SamuelLovett Indoor / Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman SamuelPottery Barn: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off ClearanceFinding ways to fill up patio space can be surprisingly difficult—and it’s easy to opt for something you less than love. Pottery Barn makes finding investment-worthy outdoor pieces easier, thanks to its vast collections of high-quality furniture and decor. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering up to 60% off with an extra 20% off already on-sale items, meaning it's worth sifting through the clearance section on hidden gems.Pottery Barn Abbott Acacia Woven Outdoor Lounge ChairPottery Barn Pearce Glass Outdoor SconceInterior Define: 25% Off Custom FurnitureWe love Interior Define for its customizable approach. The styles are ideal for those who want to seamlessly merge their indoor style alfresco. Just glimpse their best-selling Jasper Collection that now has water-resistant outdoor upholstery, quick-dry foam cushions, and a teak base. The new Riva collection is on sale, too. We love how the weather-resistant teak wood frame sets it apart from most outdoor furniture silhouettes. Even if you’re not sure which colorway to choose from, just request free swatch samples. The brand carries both performance outdoor fabrics and those from Sunbrella.Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional SofaInterior Define Riva Outdoor OttomanWayfair: Up to 60% OffWayfair is a key destination for some of the biggest furniture deals you’ll find year-round (like the aptly named Way Day that takes place in May), with their sales page constantly refreshed with new discounts. You’ll find outdoor bestsellers like rattan bistro sets and outdoor umbrellas up to 60% off right now.Winston Porter 6-Person Extendable Outdoor Dining SetJoss & Main Market SunbrellaDWR: Up to 30% Off Plus Free ShippingIf you want to create a design-forward patio space, head straight to the mecca of archival designs, DWR. Save big and add a sophisticated touch to your home’s exteriors with up to 50% off sale items this week, along with free shipping on purchases over $2,000. One idea on how to spend that 2K? This beautiful outdoor lounge chair for relaxing poolside.Design Within Reach Terassi Lounge ChairDesign Within Reach Terassi ChaiseCastlery: Up to $500 OffCalling all minimalists: Castlery brings an elevated, cozy feel to the outdoors with clean lines and weather-resistant materials. (Think teak lounge chairs with matching end tables and wicker dining table sets.) For the brand's Memorial Day sale, you can take up to $500 off sitewide.Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa, 2 Lounge Chairs & Table SetCastlery Rio Outdoor OttomanWest Elm: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off ClearanceFor a contemporary (and accessible) approach to your outdoor furniture, don’t skip West Elm’s offerings this Memorial Day. At this moment, you can take advantage of the brand’s outdoor furniture sale for 60% off au courant furniture and decor, like a full conversation set or an expandable dining table to host upcoming backyard functions.West Elm Portside Outdoor SofaWest Elm Hargrove Outdoor Expandable Dining TableCB2: Up to 60% OffCrate & Barrel’s hipper, younger offshoot CB2 is offering up to 30% off spring furnishings along with up to 60% off clearance items and double rewards on select outdoor pieces, from cushy armchairs to sculptural planters.Cascata Twisted Indoor/Outdoor Planter by Mermelada EstudioCB2 Cabra Teak Outdoor Corner ChairYardbird: 25% Off Orders $2,500+For those focused on sustainability, look no further than Yardbird. The outdoor furniture company is known for using ocean-bound plastic and other recyclable materials to create its weatherproofed furnishings, from high-quality modular wicker seating to powder-coated aluminum tables and chairs that look ultra sleek, rain or shine. Even the packaging is recyclable and biodegradable. Right now, the retailer is offering 25% off orders of $2,500 (which is all the more incentive to go in on an outdoor set).Yardbird Colby Loveseat SetYardbird Ludlow Small Sectional SetRejuvenation: Up to 60% off, plus free shippingPottery Barn enthusiasts may want to check out sister brand Rejuvenation for discounts on classic, American-leaning outdoor furniture designs. You could easily turn to the brand's coordinating sets to create a patio that looks straight out of an AD back issue, but we actually recommend checking out their outdoor decor and smaller accessories, like this charming side table and these modern house numbers. Ahead of Memorial Day, you can save up to 60% off and enjoy free shipping with the code FREESHIP.Rejuvenation Montavilla Indoor/Outdoor C-Side TableRejuvenation Haworth House NumberArhaus: 30% offArhaus’ Memorial Day sale is your ticket to an exterior space that rivals your favorite celeb’s backyard. The brand is offering 30% off in-stock favorites to celebrate the holiday, though we found a few deals with even better savings: Take the Canyon sofa, a piece with serious main character energy that’s more than 50% off right now. If you’re in the market for smaller upgrades here and there, consider this textured planter for breathing new life into your patio greenery.Arhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak Sofa in Natural TeakArhaus Sequoia PlanterCB2: Up to 50% offCB2 is offering up to 50% off this weekend, making it the perfect excuse to re-evaluate your current outdoor setup. We spotted deep discounts on pieces from their wicker Maylin collection, including a four-piece sectional set to outfit a more spacious area and a singular Maylin outdoor lounge chair to help you tackle your summer reading list.Mermelada Estudio Maylin Outdoor Sectional and OttomanMermelada Estudio Maylin Outdoor Lounge ChairBlu Dot: Up to 60% OffBlu Dot is known for its ultra-modern, thoughtfully designed pieces like this all-weather Ridge chair accented in olive-hued cushions, and the wheel-clad Perch lounger made of solid teak. The retailer is offering a discount of up to 60% off all designs, including outdoor furniture, through the holiday weekend.Blu Dot Perch Outdoor Sun LoungerBlu Dot Ridge Outdoor Lounge ChairSundays: Up to 30% OffThere are so many fabulous seats included in Sundays’ up to 30% off Memorial Day sale, including the two below that are suitable for backyards of all sizes. If you happen to have the extra leg room, the Movie Night outdoor sectional, tested by our contributor Will Porter, is another option to keep top of mind. “It matches any design style and, thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space,” he told us.Sundays Inner Circle Outdoor Lounge Chair (Set of 4)Sundays Settle In Outdoor Patio ChairAnthropologie: Up to 30% Off, Extra Discounts On ClearanceOne of our favorite gifting hubs, Anthropologie, also stocks a surprisingly robust assortment of outdoor furniture and decor. The brand is even running an outdoor-specific promotion of up to 30% off lots of regular-priced items, though true deal hunters can search the clearance section for even greater savings. This rustic teak bench can work in lots of spaces, like on the perimeter of your garden or outside your shed, while the modern Penelope table is perfect for streamlining an outdoor dining setup.Anthropologie Braced Leg Teak BenchAnthropologie Penelope Indoor/Outdoor Dining Table
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

It may be sweater weather in the Northeast, but everywhere else, the long weekend is being welcomed with open arms and sunny skies. The best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales, accordingly, are just the kinds of events you need to welcome warmer days with gusto.

It’s the first unofficial BBQ weekend of the year, after all, meaning the time to reevaluate your sad yardscape was [checks notes] seven days ago. If your current assortment of patio furniture isn’t really meeting the moment, you can score some steep deals on fire pits, dining sets, sofas, and beyond if you’re willing to crack open the laptop for a few moments.

To maximize your precious relaxation time, we’ve highlighted discounts up to 70% off throughout the Memorial Day weekend from some of our favorite outdoor furniture stores. That means all the important stuff, along with some smaller accessories like weather-resistant furniture covers. Keep scrolling to find the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales, where you can get a head start on prepping your crabgrass den for its summer glow-up.

Our Top Picks for the Best Deals on Outdoor Furniture This Weekend:

  • Best Dining Table: Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table, $749 $449
  • Best Sectional: Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa, $9,949 $7,957
  • Best Coffee Table: Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table, $625 $1,250
  • Best Dining Set: Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set, $3,089 $3,168
  • Best Outdoor Pillow: Lovett Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel, $98 $78

Crate & Barrel: Up to 70% Off

At Crate & Barrel’s long weekend sale, clearance outdoor furniture is up to 70% off (note that some are final sale), with regular-priced outdoor items up to 30% off. The nature-inspired outdoor teak sectionals are extra handsome here, though you can also find multi-tasking pieces like a kitchen island that moonlights as an outdoor bar.

Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa

Crate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with Cushion

Burrow: 25% Off Sitewide Plus Free Shipping

Burrow is the place for modular pieces that will fit in the trickiest of places—say, a rooftop patio above the sunroom. The midcentury style of the Dunes collection may be right up your alley if you don’t want something overly contemporary for your space. Made with FSC-certified teak that has a dense structure and higher concentration of oils, the set is bound to last for years with proper care. (Cue the teak cleaner kit to keep it turning from golden into silvery gray.) The upholstery is also quick-drying and won’t absorb dirt and accidental spills. To sweeten the deal, Burrow is even throwing in free shipping on orders over $2,000.

Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set

Burrow Dunes Teak 6-Piece Sectional

Outer: 20% Sitewide, Up To 50% on Discontinued Items

Thanks to their sustainably made furniture and ease of delivery and assembly, Outer has long been a shopper-beloved outdoor furniture brand. From dining sets that can seat up to eight to their new Adirondack and matching ottoman and furniture covers, you can nab everything you need to kick off the outdoor living season. Outer even includes the bug-repellent throws in their spring sale for when the mosquitoes make their debut. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering a rare 20% off everything—making it an excellent time to invest in a outdoor sofa or splurge on a full seating system. Deal hunters can also save up to 50% on discontinued items when you shop before June 2, like the brand’s teak outdoor coffee table.

Outer Teak Outdoor Sofa & Armchairs

Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table

Amazon: Up to 60% Off

Amazon’s outdoor collection offers everything from budget-friendly Adirondack chairs, outdoor dining sets, and coastal love seats, along with heaters and fire pits to keep you cozy during chillier months. When it comes to the latter, this streamlined fire pit (already affordable and even more so on sale) offers a smokeless design and a durable metal frame.

OutVue Wood Burning Fire Pits with Grill & Lid

Pamapic 5-Piece Patio Dining Set

Serena & Lily: Up to 70% Off Plus Free Shipping on Clearance

Serena & Lily’s beachy wares make it easy to incorporate coastal design into even the most aggressively suburban homes, and if you’re browsing their summer sale (ending May 28), we’d steer you in the direction of their Pacifica sofa that our reviewer Blake Bakkila says is still thriving after three years out back.

Serena & Lily Pacifica Sofa

Serena & Lily Del Mar Coffee Table

Article: Up to 40% Off

Hundreds of items are on sale at Article, one of our favorite purveyors of outdoor furniture, as we speak—like this fashionable outdoor sectional with netted armrests and a simple, but still stylish dining table.

Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table

Article Callais Outdoor Sectional

Neighbor: 15% Off Orders

AD100 designer Mandy Cheng told us “Neighbor’s roundabout sectional is one of [her] favorites when clients want a non-white sofa (which is everyone).” For Memorial Day you can snag 15% off Cheng's pick as well as everything else from the brand using code MD2025. If your outdoor space isn’t sectional-friendly, we recommend checking out the Haven sofa for a similar look. Add a couple of brand’s Low chairs to create a full conversation set.

Neighbor Haven Sofa

Neighbor Low Chair

Lulu and Georgia: Up to 50% Off Sitewide

The hotspot for designer collaborations and curated collections announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. Peruse the outdoor categories for delicious deals on outdoor furniture and decor, like the Lovett pillow that’s a must to spruce up conversation sets, and a modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed coffee table that can also be an indoor piece. Indoor/outdoor rugs are also includes in the sale—and just picture how great the a coordinating Lovett rug will look beneath a dining table. Sale ends May 27.

Scalloped Indoor / Outdoor Coffee Table by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Lovett Indoor / Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Pottery Barn: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off Clearance

Finding ways to fill up patio space can be surprisingly difficult—and it’s easy to opt for something you less than love. Pottery Barn makes finding investment-worthy outdoor pieces easier, thanks to its vast collections of high-quality furniture and decor. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering up to 60% off with an extra 20% off already on-sale items, meaning it's worth sifting through the clearance section on hidden gems.

Pottery Barn Abbott Acacia Woven Outdoor Lounge Chair

Pottery Barn Pearce Glass Outdoor Sconce

Interior Define: 25% Off Custom Furniture

We love Interior Define for its customizable approach. The styles are ideal for those who want to seamlessly merge their indoor style alfresco. Just glimpse their best-selling Jasper Collection that now has water-resistant outdoor upholstery, quick-dry foam cushions, and a teak base. The new Riva collection is on sale, too. We love how the weather-resistant teak wood frame sets it apart from most outdoor furniture silhouettes. Even if you’re not sure which colorway to choose from, just request free swatch samples. The brand carries both performance outdoor fabrics and those from Sunbrella.

Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional Sofa

Interior Define Riva Outdoor Ottoman

Wayfair: Up to 60% Off

Wayfair is a key destination for some of the biggest furniture deals you’ll find year-round (like the aptly named Way Day that takes place in May), with their sales page constantly refreshed with new discounts. You’ll find outdoor bestsellers like rattan bistro sets and outdoor umbrellas up to 60% off right now.

Winston Porter 6-Person Extendable Outdoor Dining Set

Joss & Main Market Sunbrella

DWR: Up to 30% Off Plus Free Shipping

If you want to create a design-forward patio space, head straight to the mecca of archival designs, DWR. Save big and add a sophisticated touch to your home’s exteriors with up to 50% off sale items this week, along with free shipping on purchases over $2,000. One idea on how to spend that 2K? This beautiful outdoor lounge chair for relaxing poolside.

Design Within Reach Terassi Lounge Chair

Design Within Reach Terassi Chaise

Castlery: Up to $500 Off

Calling all minimalists: Castlery brings an elevated, cozy feel to the outdoors with clean lines and weather-resistant materials. (Think teak lounge chairs with matching end tables and wicker dining table sets.) For the brand's Memorial Day sale, you can take up to $500 off sitewide.

Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa, 2 Lounge Chairs & Table Set

Castlery Rio Outdoor Ottoman

West Elm: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off Clearance

For a contemporary (and accessible) approach to your outdoor furniture, don’t skip West Elm’s offerings this Memorial Day. At this moment, you can take advantage of the brand’s outdoor furniture sale for 60% off au courant furniture and decor, like a full conversation set or an expandable dining table to host upcoming backyard functions.

West Elm Portside Outdoor Sofa

West Elm Hargrove Outdoor Expandable Dining Table

CB2: Up to 60% Off

Crate & Barrel’s hipper, younger offshoot CB2 is offering up to 30% off spring furnishings along with up to 60% off clearance items and double rewards on select outdoor pieces, from cushy armchairs to sculptural planters.

Cascata Twisted Indoor/Outdoor Planter by Mermelada Estudio

CB2 Cabra Teak Outdoor Corner Chair

Yardbird: 25% Off Orders $2,500+

For those focused on sustainability, look no further than Yardbird. The outdoor furniture company is known for using ocean-bound plastic and other recyclable materials to create its weatherproofed furnishings, from high-quality modular wicker seating to powder-coated aluminum tables and chairs that look ultra sleek, rain or shine. Even the packaging is recyclable and biodegradable. Right now, the retailer is offering 25% off orders of $2,500 (which is all the more incentive to go in on an outdoor set).

Yardbird Colby Loveseat Set

Yardbird Ludlow Small Sectional Set

Rejuvenation: Up to 60% off, plus free shipping

Pottery Barn enthusiasts may want to check out sister brand Rejuvenation for discounts on classic, American-leaning outdoor furniture designs. You could easily turn to the brand's coordinating sets to create a patio that looks straight out of an AD back issue, but we actually recommend checking out their outdoor decor and smaller accessories, like this charming side table and these modern house numbers. Ahead of Memorial Day, you can save up to 60% off and enjoy free shipping with the code FREESHIP.

Rejuvenation Montavilla Indoor/Outdoor C-Side Table

Rejuvenation Haworth House Number

Arhaus: 30% off

Arhaus’ Memorial Day sale is your ticket to an exterior space that rivals your favorite celeb’s backyard. The brand is offering 30% off in-stock favorites to celebrate the holiday, though we found a few deals with even better savings: Take the Canyon sofa, a piece with serious main character energy that’s more than 50% off right now. If you’re in the market for smaller upgrades here and there, consider this textured planter for breathing new life into your patio greenery.

Arhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak Sofa in Natural Teak

Arhaus Sequoia Planter

CB2: Up to 50% off

CB2 is offering up to 50% off this weekend, making it the perfect excuse to re-evaluate your current outdoor setup. We spotted deep discounts on pieces from their wicker Maylin collection, including a four-piece sectional set to outfit a more spacious area and a singular Maylin outdoor lounge chair to help you tackle your summer reading list.

Mermelada Estudio Maylin Outdoor Sectional and Ottoman

Mermelada Estudio Maylin Outdoor Lounge Chair

Blu Dot: Up to 60% Off

Blu Dot is known for its ultra-modern, thoughtfully designed pieces like this all-weather Ridge chair accented in olive-hued cushions, and the wheel-clad Perch lounger made of solid teak. The retailer is offering a discount of up to 60% off all designs, including outdoor furniture, through the holiday weekend.

Blu Dot Perch Outdoor Sun Lounger

Blu Dot Ridge Outdoor Lounge Chair

Sundays: Up to 30% Off

There are so many fabulous seats included in Sundays’ up to 30% off Memorial Day sale, including the two below that are suitable for backyards of all sizes. If you happen to have the extra leg room, the Movie Night outdoor sectional, tested by our contributor Will Porter, is another option to keep top of mind. “It matches any design style and, thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space,” he told us.

Sundays Inner Circle Outdoor Lounge Chair (Set of 4)

Sundays Settle In Outdoor Patio Chair

Anthropologie: Up to 30% Off, Extra Discounts On Clearance

One of our favorite gifting hubs, Anthropologie, also stocks a surprisingly robust assortment of outdoor furniture and decor. The brand is even running an outdoor-specific promotion of up to 30% off lots of regular-priced items, though true deal hunters can search the clearance section for even greater savings. This rustic teak bench can work in lots of spaces, like on the perimeter of your garden or outside your shed, while the modern Penelope table is perfect for streamlining an outdoor dining setup.

Anthropologie Braced Leg Teak Bench

Anthropologie Penelope Indoor/Outdoor Dining Table
